author: Dan Heary
title: Newington running back Mason Hill hauls in the game-winning 43-yard Hail Mary touchdown pass as Newington defeated Wethersfield 13-7 on the last second of Wednesday, evening's game at Alumni Field in Newington on November 26, 2025.  | Sports | newbritainherald.com
text:
Newington running back Mason Hill hauls in the game-winning 43-yard Hail Mary touchdown pass as Newington defeated Wethersfield 13-7 on the last second of Wednesday, evening’s game at Alumni Field in Newington on November 26, 2025. Dan Heary Nov 26, 2025 Nov 26, 2025 Updated 3 hrs ago Comments Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Newington running back Mason Hill hauls in the game-winning 43-yard Hail Mary touchdown pass as Newington defeated Wethersfield 13-7 on the last second of Wednesday, evening’s game at Alumni Field in Newington on November 26, 2025.
